item.title: Kubernetes Kubelet
item.description: kubelet is the lowest level component in Kubernetes. It’s responsible for what’s running on an individual machine. You can think of it as a process watcher like supervisord, but focused on running containers. It has one job: given a set of containers to run, make sure they are all running. There are a few ways the kubelet finds pods to run: a directory it polls for new pod manifests to run a URL it polls and downloads pod manifests from from the Kubernetes API server The first one above is the simplest: to run a pod, we just put a manifest file in the watched directory.
